require_cmd "${TM_HG:=hg}" "If you have installed hg, then you need to either update your <tt>PATH</tt> or set the <tt>TM_HG</tt> shell variable (e.g. in Preferences / Advanced)"
if [[ -d "$TM_PROJECT_DIRECTORY" ]] then export WorkPath="$TM_PROJECT_DIRECTORY"; cd "$TM_PROJECT_DIRECTORY" else export WorkPath="$TM_DIRECTORY"; cd "$TM_PROJECT_DIRECTORY" fi
( "${TM_RUBY:=ruby}" -I "$TM_BUNDLE_SUPPORT/" <<END require 'hg_diff' Mercurial::diff_active_file("-r tip", "Diff With Tip") END )| iconv -t UTF-8 -c
